unnormalised: Payment gateways, yaar, are like the aunties at a Diwali party – so many, so confusing! Which one doesn't charge a bomb? Rs. 2 per transaction feels like looting, eh? My cousin Priya in Bangalore uses Razorpay, but Ramesh from IIT Delhi swears by CCAvenue. I just want to sell my mom's awesome biryani online without bankrupting myself! Gotta find the Lakshmi to my payment problems, maybe during Onam discounts.
